title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Mix pasta with pancetta and egg mixture.
Serve with extra cheese and pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices.
Cook onions and tomatoes into a sauce.
Add chicken and cream, simmer until thick.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: Toasted bread topped with smashed avocado, olive oil, and a sprinkle of salt.
ingredients: Optional: red pepper flakes, lemon juice
instructions: Toast the bread until golden brown.
Cut and scoop out the avocado, then mash it in a bowl.
Mix with olive oil, salt, and optional lemon juice.
Spread avocado mixture evenly on toast.
Sprinkle with red pepper flakes if desired and serve immediately.
